dict.acceptation: 明亮的，鲜亮的；聪明的；辉煌的；活泼的，机灵的，乖巧的；
明亮地，光明地，光亮地；欢快地，愉快地；

sent.orig: We manufacture the Bright brand cameras, and wish to extend sales over the whole Europe.
sent.trans: 本公司现出产Bright牌相机，希望能开拓全欧市场。

sent.orig: The i in bride has greater length than the i in bright.
Is digging nostril nose bright or hand bright?
sent.trans: 挖鼻孔是鼻子爽还是手爽？

sent.orig: It can have a bad effect on both the bright and the not-so-bright child.
sent.trans: 它可以有一个坏的影响，无论是光明的和不那么光明的孩子。

sent.orig: In some cases, I am really confused, you are bright moon or a bright moon you.
sent.trans: 有些时候，我真的分不清，是月亮明亮了你，还是你明亮了月亮。
